SEARCH
Package Model

Class CheaterPlayer

java.lang.Object
Model.PlayerBehaviourStrategy
Model.CheaterPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CheaterPlayer extends PlayerBehaviourStrategy
Represents the "Cheater" strategy for a player. A cheater player automatically conquers neighboring enemy countries and doubles armies on its countries that have enemy neighbors. It does not follow the typical order creation rules. This behavior is intended to simulate an unfair advantage.
See Also:

    • createOrder

      public String createOrder(Player p_player, CurrentState p_currentState) throws IOException
      Executes the cheater strategy: auto-deploys remaining armies, conquers all neighboring enemy countries, and doubles armies on countries with enemy neighbors.
      Specified by:
      createOrder in class PlayerBehaviourStrategy
      Parameters:
      p_player - The player executing the behavior.
      p_currentState - The current state of the game.
      Returns:
      null (as no standard order string is returned).
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
